Hartville Map (July, Week 2)

Obstacle Guide (The Blue Triangles)

NumberRankHigh Attribute Needed
1DIntelligence
2DPower
3DPower
4DPower
5AIntelligence
6CIntelligence
7DSkill


The Orange Squares are indicators, on this expedition, of Intelligence levels needed to pass further. Most set at are 300.
The ones in front of Red Square #3 and triangle #4, and the one in front of Red Square #6, require 400 Int.
The one in front of Red Square #10 and blue triangle #7 requires 500 Int.
The one in front of the long path to Red Squares 11 & 12 requires 600 Int.



Locations & What You Can Find There! (Red Squares)

Red Square #Place DescriptionWhat You Find There
1"There's a strange-looking ornament on top"Mangos/Plant Egg/Herb/Green Disk chip
2Herbs/Gali Disk Chip/Pure Gold
4Plant Egg
7CD FactoryDino Disc Chip/Naga Disc Chip/Plant Disc Chip
10PyramidPlant Egg/gold/emerald/pink cd fragment/magic banana/Mint/Puragama God/Mango/Gali Disk Chip
